articles.title: Netflix Might Be Putting Its Video Games on TVs - IGN
articles.description: Netflix's next step in gaming may be a leap from mobile devices to TV screens, according to code uncovered within the streamer's iOS app.
articles.content:
Netflix may be expanding its video game offerings from mobile devices to television screens, according to code uncovered within the streamer's iOS app.

articles.title: Losing weight cuts your risk of heart attacks and type 2 diabetes - even if you put it back on - Daily Mail
